text: Ivan Zaytsev (born in Spoleto, Italy, 2 October 1988) is an Italian volleyball player. His parents originally come from Russia. He is a member of Italy's national volleyball team and the Italian club Sir Safety Umbria Volley. == Career == Zaytsev won a bronze medal at the Olympic Games in London in 2012. He won a silver medal at the European Championship (2011, 2013), and bronze medal at the World League (2013, 2014). He won the Italian Championship in 2014. ==Other websites== * Highlights (movie) * LegaVolley Serie A profile player Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Italian volleyball players Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Italy
title: Ivan Zaytsev
